name: Subhash Chandra Bose loda ka    সুভাষ চন্দ্র বসু   ''Shubhash Chôndro Boshu''
known_for: Prominent Figure of Indian independence movement activism and reorganizing and leading the INA Indian National Army in World War II against British
party: Indian National Congress, Forward Bloc founded by him on 3 May, 1939
